Posts.Content: SO PLEASED FOR YOU I WAS DIAGNOSED SEPT LAST YEAR PRETTY MUCH THE SAME AS YOU BUT I AM STRUGGLING MENTALLY WITH ALL THATS HAPPENED I CANT MOVE ON FOR FEAR OF A REACURRANCE I SLEEP EAT N BREATH THE BIG C WISH I COULD BE MORE LIKE YOU X
Posts.Title: Living again

Posts.Content: hi there louise jacqueline smith from charlies angels had a reaccurance like you and is still here years n years later its a shame u got too go threw chemo again but it can and will work second time around promise stay posotive god bless you x
